title: Good Omens Show Singing Nuns | Brand New Baby Smell | Prime Video
author: Amazon Prime Video
comment: Watch Good Omens now exclusively with your Prime Membership: http://bit.ly/GoodOmensPrimeVideo

Public: Hey Neil, is the show going to be as weird and darkly funny as the book?
Neil Gaiman: *smiles from behind a singing evil nun

"sniff obediently" and "sniff like you mean it" are possibly my favourite ever stage directions.

Been waiting so long for this series, it's awesome to see they're keeping the tone of the books when it'd be SO easy to make it another bland, serious drama.
these are the most Monty Python 3 minutes ever to have existed without featuring Monty Python...
Imagine looking at this without any context
description:
Good Omens show with Brand New Baby Smell a cappella tribute, complete with singing nuns. Written to remember and celebrate the moment when The Chattering Order of St Beryl realized their true purpose, to switch the new born baby Antichrist with the baby of an American Ambassador. Streaming now on Prime Video.
